charts.metaDescription: Near  provides a suite of real-time Near data charts and statistics to track everything about NearBlocks : Price, Supply, Marketcap, Transaction Fee and others.
charts.heading: Near Charts & Statistics

nearPrice.metaTitle: Near Price Today : Info, Chart, Stats | NearBlocks
nearPrice.metaDescription: Near Daily Price (USD) chart shows the daily historical price for Near in USD. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near blockchain.
nearPrice.heading: Near Daily Price (USD) Chart
nearPrice.description: Near Daily Price (USD) chart shows the daily historical price for Near in USD.

marketCapCharts.metaDescription: Near Market Capitalization chart shows the historical breakdown of Near daily market capitalization and price. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near blockchain.
marketCapCharts.heading: Near Market Capitalization Chart
marketCapCharts.description: Near Market Capitalization chart shows the historical breakdown of Near daily market capitalization and price.

nearSupplyCharts.metaTitle: Near Supply Chart : Circulating, Total Supply | NearBlocks
nearSupplyCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain Supply Growth Chart shows a breakdown of daily block reward and the total Near supply. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near blockchain.
nearSupplyCharts.heading: Near Supply Growth Chart
nearSupplyCharts.description: Near Supply Growth Chart shows a breakdown of daily and the total Near supply.

txnsCharts.metaTitle: Near Transactions Chart : Info, Statistics, Growth | NearBlocks
txnsCharts.metaDescription: Near transactions chart highlights the total number of transactions on Near blockchain blockchain with daily individual breakdown for total transaction , total blocks and total new account seen.
txnsCharts.heading: Near Daily Transactions Chart
txnsCharts.description: The chart highlights the total number of transactions on Near blockchain with daily individual breakdown for total blocks and total new account seen.

blocksCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain Block Count Chart shows the historical number of blocks produced daily on Near blockchain. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near blockchain.
blocksCharts.heading: Near Block Count
blocksCharts.description: Near Block Count Chart shows the historical number of blocks produced daily on Near blockchain.

addressesCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain unique accounts chart shows the total distinct numbers of accounts on Near blockchain and the increase in the number of account daily.
addressesCharts.heading: Near Unique Accounts Chart
addressesCharts.description: The chart shows the total distinct numbers of accounts on Near blockchain and the increase in the number of account daily.

txnFeeCharts.metaTitle: Near Transaction Fee History : Transaction Fee | NearBlocks
txnFeeCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain transaction fee chart shows the daily amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain (â“ƒ). All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near blockchain.
txnFeeCharts.heading: Transaction Fee Chart
txnFeeCharts.description: The chart shows the daily amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain.

txnVolumeCharts.metaTitle: Near Transaction Volume Chart : Transaction Volume | NearBlocks
txnVolumeCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain transaction volume chart shows the daily amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain.
txnVolumeCharts.heading: Transaction Volume Chart
txnVolumeCharts.description: The chart shows the daily amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain.

multichainTxns.metaDescription: Multichain Transactions chart highlights the total number of multi chain transactions on Near blockchain.
multichainTxns.heading: Multichain Transactions Chart
multichainTxns.description: The chart highlights the total number of multichain transactions on Near blockchain.
